description: This file defines CSS styles for a theme management system, including light and dark themes, and styles for application components such as header, buttons, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including text alignment, background color, and transitions.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, including layout, background color, and text styles.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
